properties.areaDesc: Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Western Uinta Mountains; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 10:00PM MST until February 17 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15 inches
with locally higher amounts particularly along westerly facing
slopes. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North, Wasatch Plateau/Book
Cliffs, Western Uinta Mountains and Wasatch Mountains South of
I-80.

* WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Expect winter driving conditions on many mountain
routes in these areas including the Cottonwood Canyons,
Daniels Summit, Sardine Summit, Soldier Summit, SR31 Summit
and Parleys Canyon. Prepare and monitor for traction laws to
be enacted.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including
Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit
weather.gov/slc/winter.

For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of
Transportation, visit
http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial
511.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY
